file_content.text: You should've known a party like this would attract Arcann's attention.
This is your blunder.
What am I, a blazing Scion? Even I can't plan for this level of lunacy.
Sister.
Enough, Vaylin.
You never wanted the throne. Return it to me, and we'll destroy the Outlander, and Father, together.
Father planted this disease in my brain. Did you know?
He never shared his secrets.
Liar!
I won't watch you destroy our home.
Did you know about the disease Father planted in my brain?
He made weapons of us both. Let me help you break free.
I don't need your help!
Contusions aside, the rebels stand ready to fight. What are your orders?
Engage the knights and create a distraction. If anyone survives, they've earned a place in the Alliance.
They'll die for their cause.
How reassuring. We'll shock the knights with our conviction.
You heard the Outlander! For Zakuul!
We've got a lock on Vaylin and Arcann. Head for the skydeck.
He can't face Vaylin alone. We need to stop Arcann before he gets himself killed.
He's no match for his sister.
A royal showdown? I couldn't have planned a better party myself.
Round up any survivors. Get everyone you can away from the action.
Keep everyone safe.
You can count on us. Great Izax, is this what being a hero feels like?
Forget Arcann. We came here for Vaylin, and I'm not letting her escape.
Vaylin is the priority.
He'll stop at nothing to reach Vaylin. We can't let him hurt innocent people.
He's a danger to the people.
I shudder to think of the destruction those two will cause.
I suspect big brother's got the same idea.
Tonight got a bit too exciting for my tastes. I suppose I have Arcann's grand entrance to thank for that.
Charge the knights and keep them busy, no matter the cost. If anyone survives, they've earned a place in the Alliance.
You're my cannon fodder.
